document.full_text: chicago's massive budget deficit is a threat to the city's economic future, mayor-elect rahm emanuel warned on wednesday as he unveiled a finance team to tackle fiscal problems.
document.title: new chicago mayor names team to tackle budget woes
lines_and_colors: chicago's massive budget deficit is a threat to the city's economic future, mayor-elect rahm emanuel warned on wednesday as he unveiled a finance team to tackle fiscal problems.
